verbose_text: Consistent with this observation, phosphorylation of ACC, a downstream target enzyme of AMPK, was also elevated by leucine compared to the controls (P = 0.014) (XREF_FIG), while EX527 treatment resulted in corresponding suppression of AMPK phosphorylation (P = 0.012) (XREF_FIG), indicating the necessity of SIRT1 for leucine induced AMPK activation.
